topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b9a30b636872173b0d0600#post_53b9a30b636872173b0d0600
But "crappy" Saturday morning cartoons inspired by video game series such as Megaman, Street Fighters, Sonic, Super Mario, Double Dragon, and Zelda games were full blown during the late 80s and early 90s.

The reason why I said "crappy", was because they were so bad that they were hits. At least when YouTube came out, and people started uploading their childhood. Many realized how badly animated, voiced, and written these cartoons were.
topics.author: 4fde5cee945b700a970060fc
